hotels.title: Family-Friendly Fiji Island Escape with Onsite Restaurant, Bar & Day Spa
hotels.description: Wherever you go in Fiji, you can expect some of the warmest welcomes, bluer-than-blue crystal-clear waters and sugar-fine sands, but nowhere more so than at this coastal paradise in the iconic Mamanuca Islands. Spread your towel on a brochure-worthy patch of sand and find isolated bliss on this glorious stretch of tropical oceanfront. Enjoy the ultimate family escape on the beautiful Beachcomber Island, where the waves of the South Pacific roll gently ashore and every moment feels like paradise. Unwind at the day spa with a range of massages and soothing treatments, try your hand at complimentary watersports or simply sway beneath coconut palms in a hammock made for lazy afternoons.
